    API Documentation for Brains SDK by Sensiya

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BrainsAPI.ActivityRecognition

      Provides information about user behavior on the device

      Provides demographic information about the user

        callback - callback to be called once the SDK is ready for usage

      • start

        public static void start(android.content.Context context,
         java.lang.String applicationKey,
         BrainsAPICallback callback)
        Start the SDK, when the application key is directly passed to the SDK
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        applicationKey - unique application key you got from the web console
        callback - callback to be called once the SDK will be ready for usage
